values:
1 MINUTE AGO: I laughed
1 DAY AGO: I was in love... 
1 WEEK AGO: I almost died...
1 YEAR AGO: I lived in the GheTT0! wUrd ^ XD

-/-

I HURT: My ankle... ow.
I LOVE: Benji :]
I HATE: My family.
I FEAR: Losing people...
I HOPE: Something works out for me...
I FEEL: Emotionally distressed.. i feel like dying.
I LISTEN: Mest - Night Alone
I HIDE: my feelings/emotions
I DRIVE: :o not yet...
I PLAY: aahah? My acoustic? :D
I MISS: ...having a life and friends...
I LEARNED: The Motivation Proclamation on my acousic
I KNOW: I might be happy someday
I WAIT: To be happy
I NEED: To get a life

-/-

CURRENT CLOTHING: ...the clothes...that I am wearing...
CURRENT MOOD: OW.
CURRENT MUSIC: Mest - Burning Bridges
CURRENT TASTE: Sour apple puckers...
CURRENT HAIR: Beanie.
CURRENT ANNOYANCE: Ankle.
CURRENT SMELL: pot...
CURRENT THING I SHOULD BE DOING: ...Sleep.
CURRENT DESKTOP PICTURE: ...GC? :D
CURRENT FAVORITE BANDS/SINGERS: :\... too many.
CURRENT BOOK: Cut
CURRENT MOVIE IN VCR: The Nightmare Before Christmas
CURRENT REFRESHMENT: OTTERPOP!
CURRENT WORRY: How I am going to make it through tonight without someone to talk to...



...I need sleep. Goodnight... *sigh*...



x---Stepherz

I still dont feel good today.. pff.. *dies* I made a new icon... seems like I'm going through those way too fast... God.. I'm so tired... 5 hours of sleep in the past 3 days, that cant be healthy. I think I might pass out. I need some pain killers. Anyone have anything to offer? lol. Grah.. I'm tired of feeling like crap... wooo.. I'mma go talk to Kayla. Yay.



x---Stephy

I could not get ONE chance to go back to sleep this morning. God fucking dammit. If it wasnt one thing, it was another thing with the child. He got mad because the DVD player fucked up his SPIDERMAN movie... of which I have grown to hate after having to watch it every morning for about 4 months. Why cant he watch The Nightmare Before Christmas?! I'd never get burnt out on that movie. I feel like strangling that child with a fucking bondage strap off of my pants or something. Gah. THEN!!! He was going through the kitchen, getting popsicles and shit... and he JUST ate breakfast. Of course, because I had fallen back asleep... I had no awareness of this until he had half of the popsicle gone. I'm gonna fucking...GRRRR!!!!! AND thennnnnnnnn..... the fucking PHONE wouldnt stop ringing... and that leads us to where I am now. Still with a headache. Still tired. I am growing to dislike babysitting a whole lot. Or as Joel said it in a simple word... Ewwwwicky. :\


So help me god if I kill this child today....




x---Stephy

Ugly me. Dammit. I am not a female-Benji. Die Danni, die. MY BEANIE NOW BENJI! YOU HO :D. And this eyeliner... was my idea 2 years ago. So blow me fucker :DDD

















WHEE :D! yep.

I have PIZZA! And I just got done swimming about 20 minutes ago. Swimming is fun. XD I won 10 dollars in a swimming contest. GOOOO ME!... ahahaha... Anyways. I'm pretty worried. Kayla kinda just like dissapeared. She's been gone for about a day now, hasnt called anyone, shown up at home, or anything. I'm really quite worried. If I lost her... I'd probably.. die.. or something. She's like one of my closest, bestestestestest friends... and we've been through alot of crap together. If theres anyone who knows me, it's her. I'm just so worried, it's almost quite sickening.. and yeah.. I'm gonna go take a shower...so...blah. Later. x----Steph

Yay! Meggyz! back! hooray! Yay! Jared will be back regularly in a few weeks! wheeeeeeeeeeeeeeee. EVERYONE IS COMING BACK. *excitement* o.o I havent talked to Jared in uber whoa like forever. XD I did last night though! =D

Meggyz is BACK....for fucking good. yeyness like whoa. Stephyz I missed you bunches. I thought about you everyday. hmpf...I missed everyone aww *huggyz to everyone*....ok im done ruining your journal. But your not on..hmpf. Your poems are great, i wont comment ill post it =D  Love you bunches <3

-=Meggyz

I thought i'd never see the day. I've learned to forget I've learned to forgive I've learned how to put up With the past I have lived I've learned that this past And horrible memories of mine Are almost just figments That will heal with time. I've learned to love again To let myself have a life And this time I wont mistreat it I'm going to live it right Theres no time for mistakes I'll learn from my past Because now I realized I'm something My happiness is nolonger a mask A mask which would shatter When I was alone Happiness is an emotion I've learned to reown I'd always wondered what it was like To actually feel like this And for once in my life I feel I'm at total bliss. what do you think?

Well... today was a fairly good day. It kinda fell down towards the end, but I'm okay now. I had to babysit again today like usually. My step brother was trying to get me in trouble and shit. He said I was trying to burn him, when he was the one playing with the lighter, and lighting stuff. He almost burnt a hole in the carpet. But there was an upside to all of that. You know that damn fucking fish, that I told you about.. well.. I BROKE THE MOTHERFUCKER!!! even ask Benj>. He heard me throw it against a few walls. Then Jessie hit his bed on my futon. I felt stupid, because I'm sure Benji probably thought I did it... =XX sorry i'm not that much of an asshole. Then my mom came over. Gave me the money for the CD, since it turned out that he never got it for me, and never planned on it. Friday I gotta pay my mom back though. My mom got mad at me because I told Benji she was bad. She's still pissed at me.. =X oops. But yeah... after my dad got home I went and got the CD. I really havent stopped listening to it. Everyone needs to go buy it cuz I said so. =] But anyways.. I was really fine. until it had set in that the phone call i got 3 days ago, about my uncle.. was true... It hit when i tried calling him to talk to him.. and i was like.. wow.. he's gone. But i'll be fine... i suppose. It's just really depressing =[. But luckily I had Benji. =D Thank yous much. Laura - - I'm sorry i couldnt be much of a help today. I dont want to see you and Benj fighting anymore... But yeah I'm fine now. Benji.. its amazing how the bracelet doesnt hurt me. I'm in awe o.o;... x---Stephy

I'm practing some of my old dance from a while ago. It makes me feel like I'm getting in touch with myself, which makes me feel great. It's great to know that I still have tact with this tallent. I guess.. I can sing OKAY too. For those of you who have heard me, you need to comment, or i will CRY. Because i suck. lol... I've been pretty happy today. Theres been a few times where i did cut today.. and i'm sorry.I feel much better, its just hard for me without my meds...


Oh and also... I GOT MY BESTEST FRIEND IN THE WHOLE WIDE WORLD LAURA BACK!!!! I luff her so much, and I guess a long break was all we needed to realize how important we are to eachother. I'm so glad we're actually talking again. It feels great to know that I have her back. Laura, I luff you a whole lot, and I hope you know you matter a whole lot to me, and if you need me I'm only an IM away, or if you still have my phone number, a call away. One day i will meet you. X)


I'm trying not to rant a whole bunch which is what I feel I am doing... ahaha.. okay I know I am doing... but yeah. It's just fun. lol.. anyways... I must get back to dancing.. =] Fun fun.


x---Stephy



OMFG and by the way.. that paragraph earlier... Benj.. AHAHAHA... IGNORE THAT!!!! *dies* you better not post that anywhere, cuz if you do I'll smack you >.<

I'm not in as good of a mood as i was in earlier. I miss Benj, and thats all I have to say. My dad left the CD at work, which made me UBER mad.. and I still havent gotten the beanie yet ;-;. Noone is helping me in my matter of an emotional slump, and my dad just keeps bitching at me >\ THIS is why I miss Benji. Because he actually tries to HELP me with my problems. =| noone else really tries to make matters better, and then they just seem to get worse. So I'm gunna slump around my room, and maybe take a nap. I'm tired from babysitting. Expecially today. Jessie got this toy from McDonalds, and it was Nemo.. and it keeps LAUGHING. He wont make it shut up, and I'm about to throw it out of a window. So... I'm gonna let myself get lost in emotional thought... and I'll probably post back later since I have nothing better to do with my life. -.-;.... I need to quit having thinkful wishing.. cuz after you wish enough.. it hurts. and Benj, I'm sorry if I hurt you, with you and your sympathy pains.. haha. I quit. Honestly this time I quit. I don't feel like taking the chance of hurting you anymore... =]. But anyways, I'm gonna go think, listen to music, and possibly take a nap. IM me if you need me and I'll get back to you.... x---Stephy....**I feel lost...**

o.o;;; I cant wait until my dad gets home. I want my new Mest CD... ehehe... *insane laugh* I have to splurge with all of their songs to keep my excitement at a bare minimum. I need to start checking the mail... I want my beanie. I am so foofing excited. WhOoP-Ah! *dies* Stuff went down at the mall... I wont say what.... But... uhm.... Lets just say I am in a peacefull bliss right now. I have NOT been so happy in i dont know HOW fucking long. It feels great! I feel like exploding with excitement. eheh.. someone help me before I lose my mind. X.x I need to keep in tact with my old friends...... =XXX Janna, i still luff yooh. And I AM YOUR MOTHER SO LEARN SOME MANNERS INFRONT OF ME!!! ahahaha... How many houses have you burnt down now?.. >\ Whoaaa... so... excited... o.o;... I want to go see that stupid fishie movie.. I think im gonna take my brudder to go see it. See. I am a good big sistahhh =DDD Anyways.. I'm bored though... but very....excited.. like whoa. *explode* THERE!!!! ahahaha. okay okay okay. I'll quit rambling. =X My pink dickies are seeeexaiiiiiii..... *skips off* x---Stephy..<3 P.S. That sticker is still on the ass of these pants. >\

So I lied about sleeping. I finished one last icon. =D Dude... I would be so thankful for anyone who got me a payed account since my dads an asshole >\ grrar. Someone help? lol... I'd let you own me!! Although you'd have to watch out for him... *points to Benj* he says he owned me first =X (My Icons) icons made by me.. =] x----Stephy

Dude... Like whoa... I love this icon. props to ME for making it. Muahaha. I'm never changing it. I love it. Alot and alot and alot and alot. o.o;;;... benj I know you'll like it, and this time you CANT HAVE IT!!!!! ahaha *greed* Anyways I'm pretty beat from having to color and erase and make transparent pixle by pixle so... psh. I'm gonna go to bed. XDDDDD did I mention how much i LOVE this icon?? <333 Sexai man on it. Wonder who it is ;] ahaha



<3 Stephyness

Pretty damn bored right now. Jamming to slipknot. I like my new layout. it's uber spiffy. Lately i kinda feel like somethings missing in my life.. i wish someone could love me like that again. sigh. so lonely. =| I need someone, and I dont know why now I'm taking the time to dwell on it. Oh well... anyways.... I got my spiffy pink dickies =] *happy* I think im pissing my parents off with my loud music. Lalalala.. hehee.. i hope they dont smack me =X I wanna go watch a movie and snuggle with my Boo-bear. Noone EVER grows out of stuffed animals. Even if you do try to put out the hardcore, no feelings vibe. lol.... hehe. I am strangely in a better mood. Oh and by the waaaaay....... SLIPKNOT IS WAY BETTER THAN GC!!!!!!! ....Kidding.... You know nothing is better than you guys, Benj. lol... ;P I'm just playing with you. Tis all. <3 Effy

Another worthless post for this journal I suppose. I wish I could get comments from you guys >\ its not fair! I love comments. Anyways. I'm pretty fucking tired right now. I just decided I would stay up and talk to Benj. But now i really dont feel like sleeping. I'm gonna sleep in hella late tomorrow.. and laugh my ass off because I wont wake uip until dinner time. that sounds like fun.I keep playing with my nose ring... Whee. I wish Caryn and Irene would still talk to me. I kinda miss them. And Sarra too... I wonder where I went wrong. I'm kinda being pessimistic right now.. or emo. I don't know why. I just blah. I'm sick and I really dont feel good.. but I don't want sleep. Can someone help me? Sometimes I wish people could just snap their fingers and cure my depression. Then again i should probably not have people fix my problems for me. I can do it on my own. Time heals. Whee... I feel somewhat better. I should probably quit posting aimlessly in my journal. Maybe if these posts were to have meaning, without me rambling on >.>;;;; Oh and by the way. I have another poem. I have to say that this one is definately one of my favorites. I'm tired of people always Seeming like I'm nothing In someone's eyes I wish i could be something I wish i could make Something out of this life Just forget about my worries All the pain and strife Just put the needle down And take it all away God knows whats gonna happen Or what the hell is making me stay I could just over dose And do just like Sid did After all he was my idol And I am now the Kid. Maybe follow in his footsteps And take it all away But that is something I will worry about Another dreary day. That is all. dude people. I need feedback, bad. please. I'm begginggggg!!! lol <3 Effahhhhhhhhhhh

<font size="3">BLOW



ME!!!!!!!!!!!!</font>


hahahaha lmfao yep. my newest phrase. BACK OFF BENJI.

You know I started to grow since you've been away > Lately, it's scarier not knowing what's become of you > Are you proud of me now, I can't tell > I'm not as fearless as you > Still I pretend that you're still standing by > To show me wrong from right > Never got a chance to say goodbye > Take this gift from me, hold it deep in mind, forever and never let this go > I used to think you were crazy > When you were hooked to the screen > But now they tell me that you're in a better place > But where did you go > And I swear sometimes you're watching over me > Still I'd give the world for the chance just to see your face again > Now, there's nothing left but time > Know that I'm following you > Eva's always on my mind and it makes me wonder > What happened to you? > You know it makes me wonder > Still I pretend that you're still standing by to show me wrong from right > And never let this go away


I love this song. Download it NOW NOW NOW >\

I don't know why i bother. my poems dont get any feedback. *dies* heres another one anyways. You always thought I could be something more I forgot the past I've shut the door I wont let myself Have a life Because if I do I won't live it right Everyone I love Has all dissapeared Nothing could bring them back Not even all the tears Magic can happen But not for me It just wont work It's not meant to be For you, for me For anything I thought just this once But it's not happening It just won't work I can't allow it to be Because for once in my life I just can't be happy. I dont know if i posted this one yet <3 Effy.

I think Meggyz is mad at me because I dont post about her in my journal. I haven't been doing deep thinking when I post in my journal really. I just post my poems. =| I'm sorry Meggyz, and I still luff you. =[

Dude. I'm getting tired of not getting any feedback on my poems. are they that bad? oh well. pssh. heres another one. You're here I'm gone So just say So-long To anything That was there I'm sorry that You had to care About me About this Just let the memories Get lost in abyss About you About how I didn't let go Until now. I'm sorry that I wasnt there Like you were But I did care I'm sorry I didn't Let you know All this stuff Before i were to go But now I'm gone And all thats left Is a tear stained letter Sealed with a kiss. lalalala...

Well i got what I wanted earlier. I feel like shit, and my step brother is better. *barfs on someone* I feel icky. And I also feel like I cant do anything right anymore. =| I don't want to give up, because I have atleast 3 or 4 people who care =|.

Bored. I wrote another poem. please. feedback. or i'll quit writing. Alone I sit Alone I cry I sometimes wish I could die If not for you Then I'd be gone You're what made me Hold on for so long. I drop the knife And remember how You would have stopped me If you were here now So I sit and stare Into the darkness of the night. And now I'm almost cerain That I'll be alright.

Benji and Joel!! *dies* Tickle: My little step brother Kiss you: ...*NO COMMENT. RANDOMS... How many times have you been kissed: Not very many. Done Drugs: oh.uhh..no? Eaten an entire box of Oreos: Yes. lol sadly. *fatassss* Been on stage: YES!! whoop whoop. at the GC concert. that was fun. muahaha. Gotten in a car accident: Nope. Well... I've gotten hitten by a car. does that count? EITHER/OR... Coffee or hot chocolate? both. Big or little? AHAHA! Size doesnt matter. its the way you use it that counts. *dies* New or old? Old... Neve Campbell or Jennifer Love Hewitt? neither.. Tom Cruise or Brad Pitt? BENJI! *dies* Tom and Brad can blow me. Vogue or Cosmopolitan? Geh.. Jeans or cords? Dickies? Sweater or sweatshirt? T-shirt. T-shirt or tank top? t-shirt. o.o; Skirt or dress? Skirt. Wool or cotton? Cotton Rose or Lily? Rose... Oldies or pop? Oldies Do you have a boyfriend/girlfriend? Nope. Never. Ever. I'm. Such. A. Loser. Fuck. *dies* Do you have a best friend? Yesss! IN THE LAST 24 HOURS, HAVE YOU... Cried? yes Helped someone? Maybe? Bought something? My bum gloves. lol Gotten sick? nope *looks at step bro and cries* Gone to the movies? Nope Gone out for dinner? No.. =| Said I love you? Yes. Benji. Written a real letter? Hahaha no. Moved on? =| Moved on from what?.. *sigh* Talked to an ex? WHAT EX? god lol. well John. Missed an ex? Not really. Glad we're friends. Talked to someone you have a crush on: ...=X yes. Benji you better love me for this icon. <3 haha.


Anyways... its about 9:40-ish here. I'm babysitting. My little step brother is sick, and ugh. =[ I am not having fun. He looks so miserable. If i could, I'd be sick not him. =| it's not fair for him. he's a kid. he needs to enjoy life. I'm terribly bored, and I feel like an ass. I'm sorry for worrying you like that last night Benj. =| Forgive me. I didnt mean to freak you out like that. I'm fine. I fell asleep... i'm soo sorry. =[ I love you though.

Agh.. he's over there coughing his head off... i feel so bad for him. =| *sigh* Someone help me take care of him. I don't know what to do to make him feel better!! *whine* =[[[  He'll fall asleep here and there but still... AGHHH!!! I wish he felt better. He just needs to rest... *sigh*; I'm gonna go watch TV with him... But ick. He smells like Vicks vapo-rub. =| i hate that stuff. *gag* *sigh*...toodleoo

--Stephy

Well.. I am bored. Benj just signed off. I was hoping he was gonna keep the away message up. Big bummer. I hope someone gets on soon because I'm uber bored. *sigh* I need something to do. Oh and Sammy, please don't worry about the poems. I don't.. and I won't cut anymore. And alot of it is from Benji and Joel's help. But if it wasnt for you then I probably would have done it a long time ago before i met them. You've gone through more pain, from what I know, than i could ever bare to imagine. You know exactly what I go through.. and I just wanted to say, thank you for being there. And now I will post another poem of mine that I just wrote. Waiting one last time To see you before I leave Because you were one of the few Who actually cared for me Just one last time to see your face Is all I want Before I leave this place Alone I sit And wait for you But then I realized.. You're gone too I wonder what happened What I did wrong That made me not realize That you had been gone for so long. Reality stabbed me Hard in the back And now it hurts And I dont quite get the nack Of all this pain Flooding me so fast But all I could think about Was our wonderful past The days we spend Just you and I Looking up at the stars At the moonlit sky But now you're gone And I'll be gone too... Because I love you so much And I need to be with you. Pleeeease people. I need FEEDBACK. *dies*
Lookah! its pictures! of me?! =D (BLOW!) (Innocent-ness?) <- hah right. (Just because) I have the tank top doesnt mean you can call me one!!! >.< *glares at Benj* pictures.. fun fun fun.

Well.. gee. I'm bored.. and lonely =/ lalala.. I decided to write yet another poem... I think.. I'm starting to become somewhat partial to my poetry.. heh.. please leave me comments on what you think about my poetry. Feedback is always nice. Alone is all I'll ever be Nothing can save Or possibly change me. Life or death Happy or sad Nothing, plain nothing Is all I've had Until I realized There was one who cared. With that person My pain I shared. Alone I felt Never again And I'm only thankful That you are my friend. yep...

I kinda would like to keep writing my poetry. I'm kinda growing on to it... even though i still think it sucks.... I'm kinda hoping everyone else likes it =D and if so, I'll keep posting it. But right now, I'm gonna post this poem, and then go to bed. If I were to die On this cold, lonely night... It'd be because noone noticed That I wasn't alright. Noone bothered to ask If I was okay So I decided to quit Not go one more day. But I know there is one of you I hold dear to my heart You were there to the end And right from the start You tried to save me Did all in your will But nothing could save me I just had to be killed So if you wonder where I am On this cold lonely night Just look up to the sky And you'll see the answer is right I am you're friend Faithful and true... And if i could give up anything... I'd do it for you. So remember this quickly And remember it right I took the bullet for you On this cold lonely night. This is for someone I love. You know exactly who you are.. =]

What can I say? You are one of the coolest people I've met. When we met...I knew you werent a regular "fan" that just wanted to talk to me so you could go to school and brag to your friends that you talked to me. You've been really nice to me, and I love chatting with you. You've also been there for me as well. Remember that time when I was "emo". I had the away msg consisting of "I'm either outside breaking something or sitting with Benj". Well, you were there for me. I'd also like to say, that i DO care for you, and i AM attached to 'yooh'. And yes, all this rambling on...it could never describe just how rad you are. You make the slow times on tour fun. Instead of sitting on the bus watching TV, I'm laughing my ass off at the conversations we have. And you dont get mad at me, like other people who IM me, when I'm busy being tackled by my ass of a brother. XD Through silly times and hard times we're there for each other. I want you to know that you ARE my friend and that I do care about you. Much love. Joel.

Okay, well here it goes... I'm going to start making paragraphs for all my friends, and what I think about them. Don't worry if I don't get you now, I will get you later, I promise. this is going to be a multiple post thing... first off... Meggyz- Meggyz, you have become one of the greatest friends to me, and I'd do just about anything for you. You mean the world to me, and you always encourage me on my singing, and anything else thats going wrong, when I feel I have no willpower left to do it. You are my inspirational boost, among alot of other things. Meggz, I love you a whole bunches, and I feel not even words can describe how much your friendship means to me. It's so amazing how close people can get in a matter of a few months. I really wouldn't know what to do if I lost you. Together, you and I are the strongest people alive... maybe not to other people, but to ourselves, we know we can make it through ANYTHING together. You and I can goof around alot, and also be serious when times get rough. You've been there for me a whole hell of alot, and I hope I've been there for you, when you needed me. I am running out of things to say about you, for whatever I have said in this paragraph cannot compare to how you really are, and how your being inflicts upon my life. Meggyz, all in all, I just wanted to say, thank you for being there, and thank you for being my friend. I couldn't ask for anything better. You, Joel, Benji, Rani, and Sammy. That's all I really, really need in my life. Joel- Joel... where to start. You are what makes me think about my life. Just to talk to you and Meggz, are probably one of the only reasons I get out of bed in the morning. Your friendship has had such an impact on my life, it's almost unbearable. You have been nothing but nice to me, and have also been there for me. Before I met Meggyz, you were what kept me alive. That one day, when you told me you were attatched to me, I started crying, because I had never had anyone really express that much care towards me before. It's quite awkward for me, to have people care like you and meggyz do. I'm glad you talk to me, and don't just look at me as a normal fan. I'm glad you can see a friend in me as well. Despite all my friends actions on tearing me away from you, it won't work, because I, myself, have become too attached to you as well. Writing these essays on people are hard, and I have to say, you and Meggyz are the hardest. As I said prior, in Meggyz, words would not express how i feel towards you, or what I think about you. I could say so many nice things about you, and none of them could compare. Compare to what you really are. I hope both you and meggz realize, that what I say in these posts, I completely mean about you two.. you two are the greatest. I just hope, that you two can say atleast half of what I said here. I would be happy if I could compare to half of what you are, Joely. There's two down... I had to get the hardest two out of the way first... I'll post back later with a new paragraph or two... Right now, I'm gonna go talk to Effy#2 =Steph=
